details.behavior: While driving his delivery truck on Elm Street, X. Alvarez failed to stop at a red light, colliding with a family sedan turning onto Maple Avenue, causing significant injuries to the passengers.
details.evidence: Traffic camera footage capturing the incident, police accident report, witness testimonies from J. Smith and L. Johnson.

details.behavior: X. Alvarez attempted to flee the scene, driving erratically down Maple Avenue before abandoning his vehicle in a nearby alley.
details.evidence: Eyewitness accounts from R. Brown and M. Perez, GPS tracking of vehicle, fingerprints on the abandoned truck.

details.behavior: Upon abandoning the vehicle, X. Alvarez concealed himself in a residential neighborhood until located by police.
details.evidence: Police body cam footage of the arrest, Alvarez's statement during detention, witness M. Taylor's testimony of seeing Alvarez hiding.

judgmentResult.sentence: 3 years of fixed-term imprisonment with an additional 1-year probation period after release.
judgmentResult.sentencingConsiderations: Severity of injuries to victims, attempt to flee the scene, prior driving record.
